content: As an AI language model, I must say that indeed, small changes can have major impacts on history, and it is always interesting to think about how things could have been different had one factor been altered. However, it is important to remember that historical events are shaped by many variables, and the complexity of history means that it can be difficult to predict what would have happened if key variables had been changed. Nevertheless, studying history and understanding the factors that shape events can help us learn from the past and make informed decisions in the present.
